name: tool_get_holdings_accounts_fundsAuthorisations_status
description: This tool checks the status of funds authorizations for a specific holding account. You’ll need to provide the account ID to get the authorization status information.

accountId.description: The ID of the account whose authorization status you request.

name: tool_get_holdings_accounts_statements
description: This tool fetches detailed statements for a holding account, including transaction history and balances. You'll need to provide the account ID to get the relevant statement information.

accountId.description: Identifies the specific account for statement retrieval.

name: tool_get_holdings_accounts_transactions
description: This tool allows you to view transaction history for a specific account. You’ll need to provide the account ID to see all transactions associated with that account.

accountId.description: Identifies the specific account to retrieve transactions from.

name: tool_get_holdings_accounts_cards
description: This tool allows you to view details about specific credit cards associated with a holding account. You’ll need the account ID to see information like the card number, expiry date, and card type.

accountId.description: Identifies the specific account to retrieve card details.

name: tool_get_holdings_accounts_emergencyBlocks_status
description: This tool checks the status of emergency blocks associated with a holding account. You’ll need to provide the account ID to see the current status of these blocks.

accountId.description: The ID of the holding accounts to check.
